imedix
Interface CentreInfoInterface

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
CentreInfo
public interface CentreInfoInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote

iMediX Business Logic RMI Server

Developted at Telemedicine Lab, IIT Kharagpur.

This Interface used to Manage Centres of the System.

Author:
Saikat Ray.
Telemedicine Lab, IIT Kharagpur, skt.saikat@gmail.com
